channel.title: Delta Object help? Delta Trade help?
channel.description:
I want to make it where you click a box and you get a key.... Which i know how to do, But i want it to only give you the key once so that you cannot get the key again... any idea how?
And i also need to know how to make an item untradeable.

item.title: Delta Object help? Delta Trade help?
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

you need a method for checking their inventory/bank so something like:

if(itemID == 1234 && (playerHasItem(1234, 1) || playerCheckBank(1234, 1))) {
sM(“You already have a 1234.”);
break;
}

this is basic, if they click the box and get the item they won’t be able to get another, until they lose/drop/sell it. once they no longer have it they can click the box again…

for part 2, the no trade thing you must open up client.java (server folder)

search for: public int[] noTrade = {

and inside that { add the item ID of what you want to be untradeable. this should also make it so if someone tries dropping it a message comes up saying it will get destroyed

Read full topic
item.source: Delta Object help? Delta Trade help?
